conformity_rebellion.description: 顺从 vs. 反抗 - An NPC's tendency to obey or defy authority and established order.

materialism_idealism.description: 唯物 vs. 唯心 - Whether an NPC believes reality is fundamentally material or conceptual/spiritual.

collectivism_individualism.description: 集体 vs. 个人 - The extent to which an NPC prioritizes the group over the individual.

determinism_freewill.description: 决定论 vs. 自由意志 - An NPC's belief about whether their actions are predetermined or freely chosen.
